class.name: jrout.tutorial.hibernate.model.Jobs
class.comment: jobs table with job titles and salary ranges. Contains 19 rows. References with employees and job_history table.

column.name: JOB_TITLE
column.comment: A not null column that shows job title, e.g. AD_VP, FI_ACCOUNTANT

column.name: MIN_SALARY
column.comment: Minimum salary for a job title.

column.name: MAX_SALARY
column.comment: Maximum salary for a job title

column.name: JOB_ID
column.comment: Current job of the employee; foreign key to job_id column of the jobs table. A not null column.

column.name: JOB_ID
column.comment: Job role in which the employee worked in the past; foreign key to job_id column in the jobs table. A not null column.
